results.title: Puzzles - 5 Wooden Safari Animals
results.description:
Cunanimals - WOODEN EDUCATIONAL SAFARI ANIMAL PUZZLES 
BILINGUAL LEARNING is fun with Cunanimals, it helps tots with cognitive and motor skill development as they learn to count, spell, read, trace, match, and math while playing... children and parents simply love them!

Edufun and Edutain with Cunanimals

They're timeless gifts for kids as they begin exploring this world; Underlined vowels, word matching, counting lines, grouping numbers and more, make Cunanimals a must have.

In the package:
Five-two piece wooden puzzles 
Lion, Elephant, Zebra, Hippo and Giraffe make it fun to learn.
Approximate Cunanimal size: 4" x 5 1/2" (sizes vary)
Made in America from eco-safe matter

results.title: American Girl Doll Clothes- 3 Piece Autumn/Fall Wardrobe - Fall Flowers and Mushrooms
results.description:
Here's an addition to my American Girl doll clothes for Fall! 

Here's a 3 piece set that coordinate for your doll's autumn wardrobe! There's a pants outfit with rust colored corduroy pants and some hand embroidery on the leg to match the floral top, and an orange fleece jacket with mushrooms appliqued on and other hand-embroidered details. This is such a fun set, your doll will love her new clothes!

Doll not included. 

Thanks for shopping with Kings Little Blessings!!

Shop.title: Kings Little Blessings
Shop.announcement:
Welcome to my little Etsy shop, so glad you stopped by!

I love dolls, and doll clothes, and I love making doll clothes, and baby clothes too! I've been sewing for my own children for over 20 years, and have been making doll clothes for almost that long also. 

I like to make quality items, with a bit of handwork done on them. The clothes are easy for little girls to dress and undress their dolls in. 

As an at-home, homeschooling, wife and mom, I love being able to use my talents and abilities to help out with our family finances. Thank you for visiting my shop!

Also, please join me on Facebook page, Kings Little Blessings.
Shop.vacation_message: Off doing a craft show! See you soon!
Shop.sale_message: Thank you for buying from Kings Little Blessings. So happy to be able to serve you. I hope you come back often to see what is new in my shop!
Shop.policy_shipping: We ship our orders First Class through the US Postal Service. This way we don't have to charge too much for shipping. If you would like your order shipped another way, please contact us first, and we will charge accordingly for the shipping.

results.title: Puzzle Cookie Cutter Autism Awareness symbol
results.description:
This is a brand new  cookie cutter from my brick and mortar store.  I sell hundreds of cookie cutters each year.  They are your typical tin cookie cutter, that cuts a great shape.  You can use these for more than just cookies.  They are great for kids crafts. To cut cheese for sandwiches.  Make shaped fudge and give the cookie cutter with the fudge as part of the gift.

This cookie cutter  about 4" in size.  good for fondant, polymer clay or other projects 

Great for fundraising for autism awareness events.

Does your family have a family game night?  Perfect for making a snack for an evening of fun.

I normally stock more of these items. If you need something you do not see listed here in my Esty store, please Email me. I answer all emails(usually in 24 hours or less)

I will ship all items after the payment clears. I ususaly ship everyday, Monday through Friday.
If you have a question or special request- let me know by email. rgwsbs [!at] hotmail.com

Shop.title: Kitchen Crafts
Shop.announcement: Coming later this month.  Christmas cookie stamps.
Shop.vacation_message: There has been a large increase in shipping costs for international shipping.  I will work on getting those set up and reopen my shop when it is done.  Sometime on Sunday..  Thanks for you patiences.
Shop.sale_message: Thanks for the purchase.  We love selling on etsy.  It is such a fun site.  We appreciate all our customers.  If you ever need anything else, I hope I can help you out.
Shop.policy_payment:
I take paypal and direct checkout. Cancellations are allowed as long as you have not paid for your item.  Once you pay for the item it will ship and there are no cancellations.

Missouri residents will pay sales tax.

International buyers may have import taxes, duties or other fees the delivery company adds to the purchase price.  Please note that this is not part of the shipping charge.  Since various countries have different procedures-please check this out before purchase.
Shop.policy_shipping:
If you are in a rush for an item- this is when it is important to convo me before purchase.  I will be happy to give you a shipping timeframe from USPS. All I need is a zipcode to double check times.  

I fill orders as they are received, unless you have a special request.  Processing times vary depending on order volume. I wished I was clairvoyant and knew when everyone was going to order at once.  I try and ship within 3 business days of receiving the order. Even if I have to stay up past my bedtime. Sometimes I am faster with my shipping.

Please note ---that the OCT-Christmas period order volumes increases and shipping speeds from USPS slow down. These two combine  into slower shipping times. Please allow plenty of time during this period.

Shipping prices quoted are first class mail and first class international.  US customers-2-5 business days ship time-depending on zip code.
International customers-times vary depending on customs delays.  generally 7 days to 3 weeks.  Some countries may be slower than 3 weeks.

Priority services are available for an additional charge and need to be set up before purchase for the best price.  I will add priority on to an order, but there are additional fees from Paypal. US customers-2-3  business day ship time depending on zip code

US customers-Please note that the only  GUARANTEE shipping method is Express.  Express is a 1-2 business day delivery depending on zip code. Contact me extra early in the day because I have a full time job and may not be able to ship your item out immediately.

International buyers may have import taxes, duties or other fees the delivery company adds to the purchase price.  Please note that this is not part of the shipping charge.  Since various countries have different procedures-please check this out before purchases.
Shop.policy_refunds:
Refunds are available for damaged or lost items.  Damaged item refunds must be claimed within 48 hours of arrival scan from USPS.

Refunds are not allowed for delays caused by USPS.  Please allow plenty of time for arrival if you have an event.  Please refer to Shipping policies for time frames.  If there is a reason that I am the cause of the delay, I will issue a refund when the item is returned to me.

Refunds are not available for misuse of the cookie cutters.  I list what each cutter is made of, so you know how to treat them.  Tin cutters will rust if you place them in the dishwasher or sink.  Rinse off the cutters and place in a warm oven to thoroughly dry.  Stainless  cutters do not rust.  Colored Polyresin cutters are tin cutters with a coating of polyresin.  This coating will prevent rust unless there is damaged to the coating.And of course,  plastic cutters do not rust.

Please look at the photos before purchase.  If you receive an item and it does not match the photo, you may contact me for a refund.  Some items may be symmetrical and others will be asymmetrical by design.  Photos will show the shape of an items.
Shop.policy_additional:
If you are in a rush for an item this is when it is important to convo me before purchase.  I will be happy to give you an estimated shipping timeframe from USPS. All I need is a zip code to double check times. 

Those who are in a rush are the customers who are stressed the most.  Please be kind to yourself and me by giving us plenty of time.  I will do my best to get it to you.  
But remember I do not control the post office.  When you are in a rush it seems that the post office likes to taunt you and take what seems (but isn't really) to be longer to deliver the package.  

 Life is busy for all of us.  Please give every group enough time to get their job completed and get your cookie cutter to you.  My mom words of wisdom.

Special orders of 6 or more of the same cookie cutter are available at a reduced rate.  Please contact me for more details.


I am in Kansas City, Missouri area. Yep, there are two Kansas Cities and both are in the central timezone.  
 A bit of silly info-There is still somewhat a border war going on here.  Kansas people don't like to be referred to as being from Missouri and visa versa for the MO people.    Both cities blend into one big city.  Of course everyone out of town thinks we are all in KS.   Even some of my out of town relatives think I live in KS.

results.title: Sasquatch Big Foot Finger Puppet
results.description:
This is a somewhat shy little sasquatch who likes to hide in tall grass and hangs out deep in the woods.  

This finger puppet is hand embroidered and stitched in *eco-friendly felt from an original pattern. Each sasquatch is an individual so facial expressions and stitching may vary slightly from the photo.

Each of my finger puppets is hand embroidered and stitched in felt from an original pattern. Each puppet body measures approximately 1-1/2 inches by 2-1/2 inches and will fit most fingers. No glue is used in the creation of any puppet.  Everything is firmly stitched in place.

Each puppet is packaged in a clear protective sleeve and is numbered by hand. These puppets make great party favors or basket or stocking stuffers or special treats just because.

IN STOCK AND READY TO SHIP NOW!

Combined shipping cost is available for multiple items. Additional finger puppets ship FREE with any order to the same address.

A wide variety of puppets are available in my Etsy shop: http://cherylasmith.etsy.com

*eco-friendly felt is manufactured in the USA from high quality polyester fiber made from 100% post-consumer recycled plastic bottles.

results.title: Wooden Toy Train.  The "No Paint" Special.
results.description:
The "No Paint" Special.  No varnish, no paints, no oils, nothing to worry about!  The only markings on these cars are in ink.  Included is a locomotive, flat car, tank car, gondola car and caboose.

The overall length of this train is 19 1/2 inches.

All the cars are made from a combination of pine, birch and maple.  Made in USA.

Part of a line of traditional floor trains. These trains are slightly larger than, and do not interact with foreign manufactured train sets, such as Thomas and Brio, that require wooden tracks. The cars are connected with a hook and loop system. This permits longer trains to be made up and when played with can make a pleasant “clicking” sound, reminiscent of real railroad cars.

Don't forget a whistle to give the steam engine realistic sound!

Shop.title: Mama D's Closet
Shop.vacation_message: We will be closed for the first two weeks of June to process a heavy order load and update the shop. Stay tuned!
Shop.policy_welcome: I'm so glad you stopped by my store! Cloth pads are something I'm very passionate about. I originally tried them in college to be environmentally friendly, but discovered quickly that eco-friendliness is just one of the many benefits of using cloth pads! They are much more comfortable and breathable than plastic disposable pads, and are completely chemical-free. Better for your body, better for your wallet, better for the environment, and, of course, better for the small businesses that craft them with care! I hope that you will consider trying them, even if you decide not to buy them from my store.
Shop.policy_shipping: Please allow two weeks for us to handmake your order. Smaller orders generally take less time; if you have any questions about your orders timeframe or need it expedited, contact Maria at maria.the.uncommon@gmail.com. If for some reason I can not ship your item within the specified time, I will notify the buyer. All domestically shipped items are sent with delivery confirmation for tracking purposes.
Shop.policy_refunds: Due to the nature of our product, Mama D's Closet does not accept returns or give refunds. However, customer satisfaction is very important to us, so if you are experiencing problems with our product, please contact us! We will do our best to work with you to find a satisfactory solution.
Shop.policy_additional:
Pad FAQs

How do Mama D's pads work?

My pads are considered envelope-style pads because they feature an outer layer, or envelope, and removable inner absorbent inserts. The envelope cover features wings that snap closed, so it as easy to put on as a disposable pad. 

The advantages of the envelope design are that the absorbency level is fully customizable this way (use the same kind of pad throughout the entire period and customize it was you need to, as opposed to buying and sorting many pads with different absorbencies). Depending on how heavy your flow is at any particular time, you can add or remove inserts for customizable absorbency! Also, since it comes apart into smaller elements, it can be more effectively cleaned.

Currently, I offer two different kinds of pads: the Day Pad and the MiniPad. The Day Pad is constructed envelope-style and is ideal for normal daytime absorbency needs. The MiniPad is smaller and in one piece. It is a little more heavy-duty than a typical cloth panty liner, but with less bulk than the Day Pad-- this makes it ideal as backup for a menstrual cup! Mama D's Closet is also currently in the process of designing an excellent overnight pad, so be on the lookout for its appearance in the shop!

Mama D's pads feature vibrant flannel on the outside, and thirsty microfiber at the core of the inserts.


************************************

~What does cloth have to offer that disposables don't?

Savings-- When you buy disposables, you are literally throwing your money in the trash, every month, for decades. Cloth pads last for years and offer a substantial financial advantage.

Personal Comfort-- There is a reason that we wear cotton clothing instead of plastic clothes! It is way more comfortable, softer, and more breathable. The same holds true for pads! One lovely bonus to using cloth is that you will avoid the chafing and itching that often occurs at the end of a period, after living in plastic for a week. :-)

Less chemical exposure-- Some women find that they bleed and cramp less when using cloth. The prevailing theory is that this is the result of your body not having to contend with the chemicals typically found in disposable pads and tampons. Also- prepare to be shocked!- I have found that you will run into FEWER odor issues with cloth... blood interacting with disposable chemicals tends to produce some weird smells.

Environmental friendliness-- Cloth pads don't take up space in landfills, don't require large amounts of chemicals and energy to produce, and don't cause emissions from being processed and delivered every single month.

**************************************

~What do I need to use cloth pads full-time?

To figure out how many pads you'll need, think about how often you plan on doing pad laundry during your period. The fewer times you plan on washing, the more pads you will need to buy. The great thing about envelope-style pads is that they clean up well with hand washing, so if you are in a dorm or shared laundry facility-type laundry situation, you can get by without going to the laundromat multiple times during your period! 

My recommended amount of pads per day is 5-6 day pads and 1 night pad. For lighter days, 3 panty liners ought to do the trick (or 3 panty liners per any day for a menstrual cup user). 

If you plan on going out and about, you'll need something to store your used pads in. If you're on a budget, ziploc bags work fine, but if you have cash to spare, I recommend using a wet bag. Mama D's currently does not offer wet bags for sale, but you can find them from many other Etsy businesses. I personally recommend Green Bumkin's shop (http://www.etsy.com/shop/greenbumkin?section_id=7493025).

******************************************

How do I launder cloth pads?

Here is what I have found to be the best laundering method: pre-soak in cold water in a small container, changing the water every several hours or so. Adding 1/4 tsp Borax to the soak water will greatly help reduce staining. If it's going to be a couple days until you wash them, you can let them air dry after they're done soaking. On laundry day, wash on cold (I throw mine in with the rest of my laundry) and air dry. Under NO circumstances should you use fabric softener on your pads! Fabric softener will coat the pads and make them repel liquid. Many women prefer to wash their pads on a hot wash cycle; if you go this route, be aware that washing on hot and drying on the dryer may cause a greater likelihood of permanent staining and shorter lifespan of the pad. Just do what works best for you, and I promise that the pad police won't be coming after you. :-)

***************************************

What about stains?

Stains won't hinder the pad's ability to absorb, but keeping pads as pretty as possible is important to many women. Pre-soaking really is key to keeping pads looking their best. From several years' personal experience, I can tell you that with a good soaking/cold wash regimen, pads don't hold on to stains-- lighter-colored fabrics DO tend to look dingy after a while, but I have yet to get a splotchy-looking pad (and this is even after several months of throwing them in with my son's cloth diaper laundry on hot).

**************************************

~What kind of soaking container should I use?

In a nutshell, anything that holds water will do the trick! I like to use repurposed plastic food or detergent containers because you can easily toss/recycle them later. A lid is a nice feature in case you want to agitate the water a bit, but I strongly recommend that you leave the lid off during soaking time to let the pads breathe and avoid odors!

**************************************

~Do you do custom orders?

I love to help customers get exactly what they're looking for! Are you on the hunt for a certain color, a special size, a different material, or some sort of pad-related thing that isn't found in my shop? Convo me with your wishes, and I'll see what I can do to make your dreams come true. ;-)

results.title: Wee Mouse Tin House PDF pattern
results.description:
This listing is for a digital sewing pattern, not the actual item. 

Make a tiny friend from scraps and take it with you wherever you go! This wee little mouse is designed to fit inside an empty Altoids® tin and will slip easily into purses or backpacks for travel. You can easily customize them for a girl or a boy, depending on the colors you choose. This pattern uses both machine and hand sewing.

The Wee Mouse Tin House pattern features:

Tiny corduroy or flannel mouse 
Stuffed pillow
Mattress
Blanket
Teeny teddy bear friend for the mouse

I've included lots of tips and tricks for easy construction -- No need to be afraid of tiny!

NOTE: This toy design is quite small and the teddy bear in particular may present a choking hazard. This is not a toy designed for children under the age of three!

This digital pattern PDF will be available for INSTANT DOWNLOAD once your payment is completed.

Included in this original eight page pattern are actual size pattern pieces, detailed step-by-step instructions and clear diagrams. This pattern is written for folks who have had some basic sewing and embroidery experience and who are familiar with common sewing terms.

Materials used to make the wee mouse are commonly available and probably in your scrap pile already! They include: corduroy OR flannel, wool or wool-blend felts, cotton ticking, stuffing and coordinating thread and floss. A combination of machine and some hand sewing are used. Freezer paper is also used to make construction simple and easy.

This pattern is in PDF format on 8.5 x 11 paper, so you can print it from your regular printer at home on standard paper or card stock, as many times as you need for personal use.

COTTAGE INDUSTRY SELLERS: If you are a home sewer, YES, it is OK to make and sell items from this pattern as long as you credit me for the pattern. No mass production allowed. Please check my policies page for details.

This pattern is © Larissa Holland, all rights reserved. Do not distribute or publish any portion of the pattern. Purchasing the pattern does not transfer you the copyright. It is unlawful to copy and resell this pattern. Thanks for respecting the copyright!

Shop.policy_welcome:
Hello! My name is Larissa Holland and I like to make stuff. Do you?

Visit my blog to read about my creative successes and disasters at http://mmmcrafts.blogspot.com/

Visit my Facebook page for even more random comments and updates at 
http://www.facebook.com/MmmcraftsFan

Thanks for visiting my shop!
Shop.policy_payment: Payment is accepted via Paypal as well as via direct checkout with major credit cards. Etsy gift cards are also welcome!
Shop.policy_shipping:
If you purchase a PDF file it is now instantly downloadable after payment is cleared. You can always find a link to your purchased files under Your Account>Purchases

If you purchase a handmade item, I will ship it to you within 4 business days after cleared payment via First Class or Priority mail. I offer shipping to the US/Canada only for handmade items.
Shop.policy_refunds:
I want you to feel completely happy with your purchase. If there is a problem, please do contact me via Etsy convo. I'm a nice person and I'd love to help. 

I will gladly cancel and refund a transaction if shipping/downloading has not taken place. 

I cannot offer refunds on shipped goods or downloaded digital files. I'd be very happy to answer your questions before you buy.
Shop.policy_additional:
COTTAGE INDUSTRY SELLERS:
If you are a home sewer and have a cottage industry personally making things with your own little hands and selling them to your friends, in a craft booth or personal online shop (read: no mass production), you can purchase my patterns for that purpose, with my blessing.

Go forth and make it a success! Make as many as you are personally capable of. Sew for your friends. Sew for your shop. Sew for craft fairs and bazaars. Sew up a storm! Of course there are terms. But not that many:

- A reminder that the copyright on my patterns still stands: That is, you may not copy, resell, share, distribute or publish (online or otherwise) any portion of any of my patterns without prior permission from me. Period. Basically anything that involves sharing any part of my patterns with anyone else is a no-no.

- Each sewer must purchase a pattern for themselves. If you have a friend who is interested in partnering up with you, or you are hosting a craft party, please refer each of them to my blog or shop to purchase their own pattern. Thank you! (Exceptions may be made in the case of charitable sewing, just be sure to check with me first!)

-Production is limited. To honor the 'no mass production' spirit, please limit your listings (or display in your booth) no more than ten MmmCrafts items at a time. This means a total of ten of any pattern combination, for instance 6 Mikey Monkeys + 4 Baby Binky Bunnies = limit of ten. 

- Include credit where it's due. Please list a credit for the pattern on each listing and also on each hang tag for the item: Pattern by Larissa Holland, mmmcrafts.blogspot.com or something like that.

- Minor derivatives are ok, but even if you make changes in the way a pattern is made, please still give a credit to me for the pattern, along with a note that it is a variation.

- PLEASE NOTE that it is really really really NOT OK to use any of my photos, images, logos, badges, or graphics to promote your site or booth on signs, flyers, tags, headers, etc... Don't do it! Those images are copyrighted.

Judging from the number of requests I get, there are a lot of readers out there who don't have the time or inclination to sew for themselves and they would appreciate knowing where to find your MmmCrafts handmade items. Let's get you two together! Send me a link to your shop so I can place it on the Mmmakers page on my blog so folks will know where to find you and buy your MmmCrafts stuff.
Shop.vacation_autoreply:
Hello! This is an automated response.
My shop is temporarily closed until April 2. I'll be checking emails regularly during that time, so I'll get back to you as soon as I am able. Thanks so much for writing. Visit my blog for FAQ and you may find the answer you are looking for!
Have a lovely day!
-Larissa

results.description:

The set includes a matching shirt, leggings and shoes. The top is made out of a sassy blue and black zebra fabric, it has short sleeves, is cinched at the waist and it velcros in the back. The leggings are made out of a black knit fabric, have an elastic waist and are trimmed with the same zebra fabric.  The shoes (from Sophia's) are included to complete the outfit!

This outfit is made to fit the American Girl 18 inch doll and other similar 18 inch dolls. 

Thanks for shopping Cute 'n Sassy Creations!

Shop.policy_welcome:
WHO ARE THOSE SMILING FACES BEHIND SMILING TREE TOYS?
Hi!  We're Justin and Kathleen, the creators of Smiling Tree Toys. You can find us in southwestern Minnesota, where we work hard and play harder to bring natural and organic wooden toys to your home.  We’re proud parents to a little girl, and we love family time, playing games, cooking wholesome meals, and being outdoors.  Visit our About page to learn more: www.etsy.com/shop/SmilingTreeToys/about/ 

HOW DID SMILING TREE TOYS COME TO BE?
We’ve always enjoyed making and giving handmade gifts from the heart, and as parents we’re constantly on the quest for creative, fun, and safe toys for our little one.  We also love to work from home and spend lots of time with our daughter.  We believe in being kind to Mother Earth and using Her resources wisely and in their natural forms.  Combine all of these things, and starting a hardwood toy shop was the perfect thing!

HOW DO YOU "GO GREEN” AND “SUPPORT LOCAL”?
-we use locally sourced and FSC certified woods
-our packaging materials are eco-friendly (recycled cardboard boxes, re-used packing paper/bubble wrap from local businesses)
-our toys are finished with our very own homegrown blend of oil and beeswax (we use a combination of certified organic camelina oil grown on our family's land and local beeswax)
-our cotton bags are made in the USA from natural cotton, free of harsh chemicals and pesticides
-we participate in our local renewable energies program
-we shop local and independent whenever possible
-we’re conscious consumers  – waste not, want not!


DO YOU DONATE ANY OF YOUR PROFITS TO CHARITIES?
Yes – ‘tis better to give than to receive!  We’re fortunate to be able to support ourselves by doing something we truly love and believe in.  So it only feels right to share our good fortune with others.  As former Peace Corps Volunteers (we served in West Africa), we make a donation to Peace Corps worldwide youth development projects for every item sold.   **For more info on the types of projects that we sponsor, see the announcement box at the top of our shop home page.**

DO YOU HAVE YOUR OWN WEBSITE?
Yes - launching September 2013.  Stay tuned!

ARE YOU ON SOCIAL MEDIA?
Yes, please join us!
Facebook: www.facebook.com/SmilingTreeToys 
Pinterest: www.pinterest.com/SmilingTreeToys
Twitter: www.twitter.com/SmilingTreeToys

IS THERE A VIDEO OF YOUR BUSINESS THAT I CAN WATCH ONLINE?
Yep! Find it on the right-hand side bar of our blog: www.SmilingTreeToys.blogspot.com
Shop.policy_payment:
WHAT FORMS OF PAYMENT DO YOU ACCEPT?
We accept credit card payments directly through Etsy or via PayPal. You can safely and easily pay by credit card (Visa, Discover, Mastercard or American Express) using either method. 

WHAT IF I NEED TO CANCEL OR CHANGE AN ORDER?
Contact us via SmilingTreeToys<at>gmail.com or Etsy convo as soon as possible. If it wasn’t a personalized or custom order and we haven't yet shipped it, we'll make the necessary changes or issue you a full refund.

DO YOU CHARGE SALES TAX?
Minnesota residents pay 6.875% sales tax. Non-Minnesota residents who provide a Minnesota ship-to address also pay sales tax.
Shop.policy_shipping:
HOW LONG DO ORDERS SHIPPING WITHIN THE US TAKE?
We usually ship in 1-4 business days via USPS First Class or Priority Mail. If you need something by a certain date, check with us prior to purchasing. 

Once shipped, domestic Priority Mail packages normally take 2-3 business days to reach their destinations, and domestic First Class packages take 3-4 business days.  Delivery confirmation is provided free of charge on all domestic orders. 

DO YOU SHIP INTERNATIONALLY?
Yes, we ship via First Class or Priority International to anywhere in the world that the United States Postal Service delivers. (Tracking and delivery confirmation is provided for Priority International orders, but NOT for First Class International.) 

HOW LONG DO INTERNATIONAL ORDERS TAKE?
We usually ship in 1-4 business days, and transit times vary depending on their destination and countries' customs procedures. In general, expect 1-4 week transit time for First Class International, and 6-10 business day delivery for Priority International. (Package tracking is NOT available for First Class International packages once they depart the US.)  We promise it'll be well worth the wait!

HOW MUCH DOES SHIPPING COST?
We offer two flat-rate domestic shipping options to anywhere in the US:
$2.95 - all teethers, rattles, and puzzles
$5.95 - everything else
FREE SHIPPING - all personalized ornaments
*these shipping rates are for delivery to a single mailing address*

International shipping rates depend on the item and destination.  Refer to item listings for specific international rates.

CAN I SHIP ITEMS TO MORE THAN ONE LOCATION?
You'll need to make a separate purchase for EACH ship-to address. Our flat-rate shipping offers are only valid for items shipping to a single domestic address.

CAN YOU SEND MY TOYS DIRECTLY TO THE LUCKY LITTLE RECIPIENT?
Yes, no problem!  Please complete your purchase as you normally would and enter the lucky little one’s name and shipping address when you check out.  If you want us to include a personalized gift note, just let us know in the "Note to Seller" box.  (All receipts are sent electronically to the buyer, so your package will not include any paper receipts.)

IS DELIVERY CONFIRMATION AVAILABLE?
Yes, for orders shipping within the US we provide delivery confirmation free of charge.  For international orders, package tracking is only available if you upgrade to Priority Mail International (ask us for details before purchasing).

CAN I PAY EXTRA TO ADD PACKAGE TRACKING / INSURANCE TO MY INTERNATIONAL ORDER?  
Yes. We can upgrade your shipping method to Priority International.  This method offers package tracking and estimated (but NOT guaranteed) delivery in 6-10 business days. Or, you can purchase package insurance for either First Class or Priority International.  If you'd like to upgrade, contact us BEFORE ordering.

HOW DO YOU PACKAGE YOUR ITEMS FOR SHIPPING?
We ship in recycled, eco-friendly cardboard boxes and padded envelopes. For void fill, we normally use natural brown paper reclaimed from local businesses. We sometimes re-use bubble wrap or air pockets (also reclaimed from local sources). Please recycle or re-use all of these materials after you receive your order!
Shop.policy_refunds:
WHAT'S YOUR RETURN POLICY? 
We stand behind all of our items and we believe you’ll love them as much as we do!  If for any reason you aren't satisfied with your purchase, please let us know. You can send it back to us in its original, unused condition within 2 weeks of receiving it and we'll issue you a full refund. Buyer is responsible for return shipping costs. Personalized toys and custom orders are NOT returnable. In the event that a manufacturer's defect is found on any item, we'll take care of everything for you (be it a replacement, refund, or other accommodations). 

WHAT ABOUT SHIPPING ERRORS AND LOST PACKAGES?
Sorry, we can't be held responsible for shipping errors beyond our control such as delayed/damaged/lost packages or incorrect addresses provided by the buyer.

We package all of our toys very carefully and provide tracking/delivery confirmation on all domestic orders, so shipping errors are very rare.

In the unlikely event that your package is lost in the mail, we will refund you for the cost of the toys (NOT including shipping fees).  For lost packages to be eligible for a refund minus shipping, you must notify us within 90 days of the shipping date.
Shop.policy_additional:
HOW DO I CONTACT YOU?
Email: SmilingTreeToys<at>gmail.com
Website: www.SmilingTreeToys.com {launching Sept 2013}
Facebook, Pinterest, & Twitter: SmilingTreeToys

DO YOU OFFER GIFT NOTES AND WRAPPING?
Our toys come ready-to-gift in USA-made cotton bags. These bags are ideal for gifting, storage, and travel.  If you like, we can add a handwritten gift note to the bag.  Just let us know what you want it to say in the “Note to Seller” when you checkout. We don't offer additional gift wrapping.

DO YOU TAKE CUSTOM ORDERS?
Sometimes, depending on the specifics of your request.  Just contact us and we’ll get talking.

HOW DO YOU COLOR YOUR WOODS?  WHAT FINISH DO YOU APPLY?
We never use stains, paints, or dyes. We use American grown hardwoods, and all of the gorgeous colors and grain patterns you see are 100% natural!  We simply coat them with our unique, homegrown finish: organic camelina oil (grown on our family's land) and local beeswax.  Our teethers come un-oiled, because less is more!

CAN I GET MY TOYS WITHOUT THE ALL NATURAL OIL FINISH?
Yes, of course. Just tell us in the 'Note to Seller' when you check out that you'd like your toys unfinished.

DO YOUR WOODEN TOYS SPLINTER?
No. We use only the finest, non-splintering American hardwoods and individually hand sand every piece so that it's silky smooth.

HOW DO I CARE FOR MY SMILING TREE TOYS?
All of our items come with printed care for instructions. Because we use the finest in American hardwoods, our toys are very durable and require little care.  We do, however, have a few suggestions for keeping your toys in tippity-top shape. (We know you’re busy parents, so don’t worry - it only takes two minutes!)

All teethers are unfinished and non-splintering. Over time, as your little one chomps on them you may find they lose some of their smoothness. Simply use a dry kitchen scrubber pad or fine-grit sandpaper to bring them back to life. 

All of our other toys are finished with our blend of homegrown organic camelina oil and beeswax.  We’ve found this to be the best 100% organic and safe finish for protecting wood and preserving its natural beauty.  If you find your toys lose a bit of their smoothness or sheen, lightly hand sand with fine-grit sandpaper or a dry kitchen scrubber pad and re-finish with a food-grade oil.

DO YOU OFFER GIFT CARDS?
Yes. You'll find listings for $25 and $50 Smiling Tree gift cards in our 'Wooden Toys' section.  If you'd like one in a different dollar amount, let us know.

DO YOU SELL WHOLESALE?
We offer a limited portion of our product line for wholesale.  Email us at SmilingTreeToys<at>gmail.com to request current wholesale info.  We cannot take wholesale orders between August 1st and December 31st, as that's our busy retail time. Sorry!

CAN I CREATE A SMILING TREE GIFT REGISTRY?
Sure! Many couples use Etsy's wedding registry as their baby registry. Simply create a wedding registry, add your favorite Smiling Tree Toys and other handmade goods, and share it with your family and friends.  It's super easy for anyone to navigate.  We promise!

So it only feels right to share our good fortune with others.  As former Peace Corps Volunteers (we served in West Africa), we make a donation to Peace Corps worldwide youth development projects for every item sold.   **For more info on the types of projects that we sponsor, see the announcement box at the top of our shop home page.**

DO YOU HAVE YOUR OWN WEBSITE?
Yes - launching September 2013.  Stay tuned!

ARE YOU ON SOCIAL MEDIA?
Yes, please join us!
Facebook: www.facebook.com/SmilingTreeToys 
Pinterest: www.pinterest.com/SmilingTreeToys
Twitter: www.twitter.com/SmilingTreeToys

IS THERE A VIDEO OF YOUR BUSINESS THAT I CAN WATCH ONLINE?
Yep! Find it on the right-hand side bar of our blog: www.SmilingTreeToys.blogspot.com
Shop.policy_payment:
WHAT FORMS OF PAYMENT DO YOU ACCEPT?
We accept credit card payments directly through Etsy or via PayPal. You can safely and easily pay by credit card (Visa, Discover, Mastercard or American Express) using either method. 

WHAT IF I NEED TO CANCEL OR CHANGE AN ORDER?
Contact us via SmilingTreeToys<at>gmail.com or Etsy convo as soon as possible. If it wasn’t a personalized or custom order and we haven't yet shipped it, we'll make the necessary changes or issue you a full refund.

DO YOU CHARGE SALES TAX?
Minnesota residents pay 6.875% sales tax. Non-Minnesota residents who provide a Minnesota ship-to address also pay sales tax.
Shop.policy_shipping:
HOW LONG DO ORDERS SHIPPING WITHIN THE US TAKE?
We usually ship in 1-4 business days via USPS First Class or Priority Mail. If you need something by a certain date, check with us prior to purchasing. 

Once shipped, domestic Priority Mail packages normally take 2-3 business days to reach their destinations, and domestic First Class packages take 3-4 business days.  Delivery confirmation is provided free of charge on all domestic orders. 

DO YOU SHIP INTERNATIONALLY?
Yes, we ship via First Class or Priority International to anywhere in the world that the United States Postal Service delivers. (Tracking and delivery confirmation is provided for Priority International orders, but NOT for First Class International.) 

HOW LONG DO INTERNATIONAL ORDERS TAKE?
We usually ship in 1-4 business days, and transit times vary depending on their destination and countries' customs procedures. In general, expect 1-4 week transit time for First Class International, and 6-10 business day delivery for Priority International. (Package tracking is NOT available for First Class International packages once they depart the US.)  We promise it'll be well worth the wait!

HOW MUCH DOES SHIPPING COST?
We offer two flat-rate domestic shipping options to anywhere in the US:
$2.95 - all teethers, rattles, and puzzles
$5.95 - everything else
FREE SHIPPING - all personalized ornaments
*these shipping rates are for delivery to a single mailing address*

International shipping rates depend on the item and destination.  Refer to item listings for specific international rates.

CAN I SHIP ITEMS TO MORE THAN ONE LOCATION?
You'll need to make a separate purchase for EACH ship-to address. Our flat-rate shipping offers are only valid for items shipping to a single domestic address.

CAN YOU SEND MY TOYS DIRECTLY TO THE LUCKY LITTLE RECIPIENT?
Yes, no problem!  Please complete your purchase as you normally would and enter the lucky little one’s name and shipping address when you check out.  If you want us to include a personalized gift note, just let us know in the "Note to Seller" box.  (All receipts are sent electronically to the buyer, so your package will not include any paper receipts.)

IS DELIVERY CONFIRMATION AVAILABLE?
Yes, for orders shipping within the US we provide delivery confirmation free of charge.  For international orders, package tracking is only available if you upgrade to Priority Mail International (ask us for details before purchasing).

CAN I PAY EXTRA TO ADD PACKAGE TRACKING / INSURANCE TO MY INTERNATIONAL ORDER?  
Yes. We can upgrade your shipping method to Priority International.  This method offers package tracking and estimated (but NOT guaranteed) delivery in 6-10 business days. Or, you can purchase package insurance for either First Class or Priority International.  If you'd like to upgrade, contact us BEFORE ordering.

HOW DO YOU PACKAGE YOUR ITEMS FOR SHIPPING?
We ship in recycled, eco-friendly cardboard boxes and padded envelopes. For void fill, we normally use natural brown paper reclaimed from local businesses. We sometimes re-use bubble wrap or air pockets (also reclaimed from local sources). Please recycle or re-use all of these materials after you receive your order!
Shop.policy_refunds:
WHAT'S YOUR RETURN POLICY? 
We stand behind all of our items and we believe you’ll love them as much as we do!  If for any reason you aren't satisfied with your purchase, please let us know. You can send it back to us in its original, unused condition within 2 weeks of receiving it and we'll issue you a full refund. Buyer is responsible for return shipping costs. Personalized toys and custom orders are NOT returnable. In the event that a manufacturer's defect is found on any item, we'll take care of everything for you (be it a replacement, refund, or other accommodations). 

WHAT ABOUT SHIPPING ERRORS AND LOST PACKAGES?
Sorry, we can't be held responsible for shipping errors beyond our control such as delayed/damaged/lost packages or incorrect addresses provided by the buyer.

We package all of our toys very carefully and provide tracking/delivery confirmation on all domestic orders, so shipping errors are very rare.

In the unlikely event that your package is lost in the mail, we will refund you for the cost of the toys (NOT including shipping fees).  For lost packages to be eligible for a refund minus shipping, you must notify us within 90 days of the shipping date.
Shop.policy_additional:
HOW DO I CONTACT YOU?
Email: SmilingTreeToys<at>gmail.com
Website: www.SmilingTreeToys.com {launching Sept 2013}
Facebook, Pinterest, & Twitter: SmilingTreeToys

DO YOU OFFER GIFT NOTES AND WRAPPING?
Our toys come ready-to-gift in USA-made cotton bags. These bags are ideal for gifting, storage, and travel.  If you like, we can add a handwritten gift note to the bag.  Just let us know what you want it to say in the “Note to Seller” when you checkout. We don't offer additional gift wrapping.

DO YOU TAKE CUSTOM ORDERS?
Sometimes, depending on the specifics of your request.  Just contact us and we’ll get talking.

HOW DO YOU COLOR YOUR WOODS?  WHAT FINISH DO YOU APPLY?
We never use stains, paints, or dyes. We use American grown hardwoods, and all of the gorgeous colors and grain patterns you see are 100% natural!  We simply coat them with our unique, homegrown finish: organic camelina oil (grown on our family's land) and local beeswax.  Our teethers come un-oiled, because less is more!

CAN I GET MY TOYS WITHOUT THE ALL NATURAL OIL FINISH?
Yes, of course. Just tell us in the 'Note to Seller' when you check out that you'd like your toys unfinished.

DO YOUR WOODEN TOYS SPLINTER?
No. We use only the finest, non-splintering American hardwoods and individually hand sand every piece so that it's silky smooth.

HOW DO I CARE FOR MY SMILING TREE TOYS?
All of our items come with printed care for instructions. Because we use the finest in American hardwoods, our toys are very durable and require little care.  We do, however, have a few suggestions for keeping your toys in tippity-top shape. (We know you’re busy parents, so don’t worry - it only takes two minutes!)

All teethers are unfinished and non-splintering. Over time, as your little one chomps on them you may find they lose some of their smoothness. Simply use a dry kitchen scrubber pad or fine-grit sandpaper to bring them back to life. 

All of our other toys are finished with our blend of homegrown organic camelina oil and beeswax.  We’ve found this to be the best 100% organic and safe finish for protecting wood and preserving its natural beauty.  If you find your toys lose a bit of their smoothness or sheen, lightly hand sand with fine-grit sandpaper or a dry kitchen scrubber pad and re-finish with a food-grade oil.

DO YOU OFFER GIFT CARDS?
Yes. You'll find listings for $25 and $50 Smiling Tree gift cards in our 'Wooden Toys' section.  If you'd like one in a different dollar amount, let us know.

DO YOU SELL WHOLESALE?
We offer a limited portion of our product line for wholesale.  Email us at SmilingTreeToys<at>gmail.com to request current wholesale info.  We cannot take wholesale orders between August 1st and December 31st, as that's our busy retail time. Sorry!

CAN I CREATE A SMILING TREE GIFT REGISTRY?
Sure! Many couples use Etsy's wedding registry as their baby registry. Simply create a wedding registry, add your favorite Smiling Tree Toys and other handmade goods, and share it with your family and friends.  It's super easy for anyone to navigate.  We promise!

Shop.sale_message:
Thank you for your purchase!

Here is some quick info about payment in response to a few frequently asked questions:

Please note that, if using eCheck payments made through PayPal, these will take about 4 business days to clear, and shipping will be delayed until after payment clears.  Naturally, if your order has been delayed well beyond that, feel free to contact me... I am always happy to help!

If you want to pay via Check or Money Order, please send payment to the following address:

Christen Haden
2018 Folkston Dr
Durham, NC 27704

Of course, if you have additional questions or comments, please feel free to contact me via Etsy convo, or at info@needlenoodles.com

Thank you!

P.S.  If you enjoy your NeedleNoodles purchase (and I hope that you do) and wish to stop by again in the future, use coupon code WELCOMEBACK for 10% off of any order from my Etsy shop.
Shop.policy_welcome: Hello, and welcome to my shop!  I have set down answers to a few of my most frequently asked questions.  If you have a query which is not addressed here, please contact me via Etsy convo, or via my website at http://www.NeedleNoodles.com, and I will be happy to help.
Shop.policy_payment: I accept payment via PayPal, check, or money order.  Please note that payments via check, money order, or PayPal eCheck will take a few days to clear.
Shop.policy_shipping:
Digital items (patterns) will be sent via email and should arrive within 24 hours of payment clearing.  

Please check that the email address listed with your Etsy account is current.  If you wish for a pattern to be sent to a different email address please indicate this in your comments when making your purchase.  For those using PayPal, if your PayPal email address differs from your Etsy email address, both will be used.

If your pattern does not arrive within 24 hours of payment clearing, *please* contact me, as that generally means that I have sent your pattern, but it has gone to spam, or the wrong email address, or has otherwise not come through.


Physical items will be sent via USPS First Class mail unless other arrangements are made.  Physical items generally ship within 48 hours of payment clearing.  Custom-made items may naturally take longer, and in this case the estimated completion time will be indicated in the item listing.

For those using PayPal, if the shipping address listed with your Etsy account differs from the address listed with your PayPal account, I will contact you to confirm the correct address.  If I am unable to reach you within 2 days, your item will ship to your Etsy address by default.

If you would like to have your item shipped to an alternate address, please indicate this in your comments when making your purchase.
Shop.policy_refunds:
Customer satisfaction matters!  If you have questions or concerns regarding your purchase, please contact me, and I will be happy to work with you.  

Physical items can be returned for a replacement or a refund within 30 days.

Due to their nature, digital items cannot be returned.  However, I am happy to send replacement copies of patterns if your files are lost, corrupted, or otherwise incorrect.
Shop.policy_additional:
Custom Orders:  

I am happy to take custom orders.  Feel free to contact me with your ideas and we can discuss options.  Please know in advance that my policy is not to make items from trademarked characters (Hello Kitty, Disney princesses, etc.), or to make direct copies of others' work.


Trades:

Trades are fun!  However, my house is also quite full, so, I usually only accept trades for consumable items (yarn, spinning fiber, soap, food, etc.)


Buying for children:

Many of my items contain small or breakable pieces, and as such, are not safe for very young children (particularly those under the age of 3)
Please feel free to contact me with questions and comments about age-appropriate toys.


Help with Patterns:

I do post the odd mini-tutorial and clarification here:
http://needlenoodles.com/home/?q=taxonomy/term/5

or, contact me via Etsy convo.


Splitting Patterns:

I do not break up patterns containing multiple projects into cheaper single-project patterns.  The rationale is that, once the labor cost of re-doing page layout is taken into consideration, the price of an individually customized pattern would be greater than that of the original pattern set.


Other Sellers Selling Items Made From My Patterns:

I am generally okay with individual crafters making use of my patterns in items that they sell.  However, I do ask that they give credit to me for the design.  Please feel free to contact me with any questions.

results.title: Baby Toothy the Tooth Fairy Pillow
results.description:
***Toothy is made with ultra cuddly plush fabric and will not pill like fleece***

Baby Toothy is 5 1/2 inches high and 5 inches wide. He is super soft and cuddly and made with plush fabric.  Toothy comes with a pocket on his back side for safe storage of your childs tooth. 

Toothy can be used in any way when your child is awaiting the Tooth Fairys arrival. He can fit comfortably under your childs pillow, be hugged all night long or he can even sit on your childs bureau. Whatever makes your child more comfortable upon awaiting arrival of the Tooth Fairy.

results.title: Customize Your Own Quiet Book with 10 activities
results.description:
A Quiet Book is great to keep children busy during church, in the car, at the doctor or to simply play with at home. It is a great way to keep those busy little minds going.

This is a custom made book so you get to choose what goes inside in 4 simple steps.

Each book is a 5x7 book when folded closed. Which is great to throw in a purse or bag and take anywhere and it fits nicely on your little ones lap. When opened it measures about
10 ½ inches x 7 inches.


STEP 1:
Choose 10 of these activities:
- Crayons and Notebook Page (notebook and crayons included) (this takes 2 activities)
- Weave an Apple Pie
- Build an Ice Cream Cone
- Change the Seasons (this takes 2 activities)
- Button the Flowers
- Lace the Ballet Slipper
- Tie the Football
- Collect the Apples
- Peek a Boo Counting (counts up to 5 or 3) (this can be 1 or 2 activities)
- Help the Frog Eat the Bugs
- Match the Ribbon to the Balloon
- Marble Maze (takes 2 activities)
- Match the Shapes
- Zip the Corn
- Button the Wheels on the Train
- Counting the beads
- Tic-Tac-Toe

STEP 2:
Choose 2 Colors. The main book color and accents color:
White
Pink
Hot Pink
Red
Yellow
Golden Yellow
Lime Green
Green
Light Blue
Blue
Dark Blue
Purple
Gray
Light Brown
Black


STEP 3:
You can also choose if you would like a ribbon handle or a Velcro strap to close the book

STEP 4:
You can choose to put your child's name on the book as well. The name will generally be on the back cover of the book.

Please make your selections in the notes section when you check out.

Also if you need the book by a specific date please indicate in the notes section or contact me. I do offer 2 day air shipping for $15.00. Please contact me before ordering if you need express shipping. Usually the book takes between 1 to 2 weeks to finish.

If you have any questions please email me at handcraftingharmony [!at] gmail.com.

results.title: Personalized Wooden Name Puzzle - Handcrafted - Any Name up to 9  Letters -  Perfect Baby Birthday Gift
results.description:
I only ship to the address on the etsy invoice.  No exceptions.  It does not have to match the billing address.

Use this listing to purchase any name of your choice, up to 9 upper and lower case letters and/or spaces.  All caps are NOT an option on this listing.  Shapes, shown in other listings, are NOT available on this puzzle.

The only color options are those shown; 5 bright colors and 5 pastel colors.  If you want the colors in a particular order, do not buy from this listing.  You must ask for a custom listing.  Custom listings for this item start at $20.95.

The place to put the name you want, is in the "Note to JandPWoodProducts" box that comes up when you add this item to your shopping cart.  Please DO NOT key the name in all caps.  If purchasing more than one, please put the name and color for each in the message box.

These puzzles, made with a hard maple face, are a great way for a child to recognize and learn to spell their name. Letters are 1/4" thick.  Capitol letters are about 3" tall.  Over all size is about  4" high and 10" to 18" long depending on name.  Interior letter portions (like in an A,a, B,b, D, etc.) are left natural and are not separate pieces.  All corners and edges are rounded and sanded smooth.

All paints and clear coats are moisture resistant, non-toxic (no lead),made in USA, and child safe.  Adult supervision is recommended for a great learning experience for the recipient.

Please see my "store policies" for the latest shipping information and why I don't use pegs here:

http://www.etsy.com/shop/JandPWoodProducts/policy

Combined shipping rates only apply for items going to the same address.

Orders requesting something different than what is specifically being sold in this listing will be refunded and cancelled.

Shop.policy_welcome: Welcome to my etsy Store.  I am trying to put more info here rather than on each listing. It will be easier to just update the information here than each individual listing.
Shop.policy_payment: I only accept paypal and credit card payment through etsy.
Shop.policy_shipping:
I only ship to the address on the etsy invoice. NO exceptions. It does NOT have to match the billing address.  I DO NOT offer local pickup.  

I don't gift wrap, but will include a gift note.  I don't send invoices in any package.  Your invoice is available on etsy for you to view or print.

The "ready to ship" time or "turn around" time is the approximate amount of time it takes for me to complete your order.  Occasionally it may take a day or two longer.   It does NOT include the time it takes for the shipper to get it from me to you, which is normally 2 to 5 business days.  I ship items USPS First Class, USPS Priority, or FedEx Ground.

When ordering name puzzles, please, key the name / names you are ordering just as you want them on the puzzle. The names are copied and pasted into the pattern software,  to eliminate spelling errors.

When placing an order please put all the personalization information in the notes section when checking out. This includes the name and colors (bright or pastel), If ordering a two name or name and number puzzle, I need to know if it is for a boy or girl. If I am sending your order to the recipient, that address must be on the etsy invoice.  NO exceptions.    I suggest checking all mailing addresses at

http://www.melissadata.com/lookups/addresscheck.asp

to make sure they are valid. FedEx charges $12.00 for address corrections.  If the address provided has to be corrected by FedEx this cost will be your responsibility. The shipping software I use pulls the address off the etsy invoice to prevent address errors. (I do not require the etsy address match the paypal address.) 

All international orders require a phone number for shipping purposes.
Shop.policy_refunds: No Refunds.  If there is a problem, please contact me ASAP so it can be resolved.
Shop.policy_additional:
To Peg or not to Peg?

The "pegs" used on many puzzles are "wheel axle pegs." They are not intended to be used as a peg protruding from a toy. When they are used in a wheel there is no protrusion.  I would not want my grandchildren stepping barefoot or falling on one of those pegs. I think the result would not be pretty.

Again, this is my personal observation and opinion. Others certainly have their own, which is fine. I personally have a better "comfort level" not using pegs.

I was recently asked how do you get the pieces out if there are no pegs?  Children understand the "play" is to tip the the puzzle upside down, mix the pieces up, and then put them back in place.

results.title: Minnie Mouse Car Cozy Coupe Kit Vinyl Sticker and Tutorial Package
results.description:
This listing is for the kit needed to create YOUR OWN Minnie Mouse Cozy Coupe Car like the one seen in the pictures or other similar cars on Pinterest. Included in the kit is:
~ 30 - 3" (inch) white vinyl sticker dots for the body of the car (shown in picture , the larger dots)
~ 25 - 1/2" (inch) white vinyl sticker dots for the bow on the ears (shown in picture, the smaller dots)
~ Nameplate which is your child's name or nickname to fit in the space of the "license plate" on the back of the car, and if your child's name or nickname contains the letter "I" a mickey head for the "dot" above the "I" will be included - all made of white vinyl sticker WITH TRANSFER TAPE INCLUDED (this is so you can apply the name in one piece and straight!) (EXAMPLE OF THE NAME WITH MICKEY HEAD IS SHOWN IN THE PICTURE!) PLEASE SPECIFY YOUR CHILD'S NAME IN THE COMMENT BOX AT CHECKOUT!
~ A poster board stencil of the ears and bow for the top of the car for YOU TO TRACE ONTO WOOD or whatever type of material you choose to use to create the ears and bow (poster board color will vary) EXAMPLE OF THE STENCIL IS SHOWN IN THE PICTURE
~ A typed tutorial of how I disassembled, painted, reassembled, created the ears/bow, attached ears/bow, and applied the sticker dots and name plate and the materials used (THIS TUTORIAL IS MERELY A GUIDE AND HOW I CHOSE TO CREATE THIS CAR, USE THIS GUIDE HOWEVER YOU WISH OR CREATE YOUR OWN CAR HOWEVER YOU WISH!)
~ For an EXTRA $2.00 I can also send in white vinyl sticker letter the word "GAS" , also in the DISNEY FONT, if you would like to apply this to the gas cap on your cozy coupe and  if it comes with one and you paint it a different color than white. results.title: Pandemic Virus Tokens
results.description:
Viruses are spreading, to epidemic proportions!  In the board game Pandemic, it's your job to fight off the spread of disease.  These little virus tokens will help make the situation a little less dire.  At least the diseases are cute!

Included in this set are 24 of each red, blue, yellow, and black handmade polymer clay tokens, and 12 purple virus tokens for the expansion to the game, "On the Brink."   Each token is approximately the size of the original virus cubes, though variations in designs may occur.

They come packaged nicely for gift-giving in an Epicycle Designs gift box, and would pair nicely with our role figurine sets:

Shop.title: Handmade Meeples and Custom Board Game Tokens
Shop.announcement: The original Etsy shop selling Agricola tokens, unique Settlers of Catan pieces, gifts for geeky friends, clay game meeples, board game bags, gamer jewelry, and more!
Shop.sale_message:
Thank you so much for purchasing from Epicycle Designs. 

In the meantime, if you want to keep up on projects and ideas, new and old, please check out our facebook fan page: http://www.facebook.com/epicycledesigns,
Or connect with us on Twitter @epicycledesigns.
Shop.policy_welcome:
Welcome to Epicycle Designs!  This store is the ORIGINAL game piece seller on Etsy -- we've been here doing business since March of 2010, getting better at what we do and adding more and more items to add to your board gaming fun!

My name's Tabitha, nice to have you here!  This shop is the creative outlet of a stay-at-home wife that has grown into a business.

The first question always is, what's an epicycle? Simple, actually -- a tiny circle on a larger circle.  An ancient astonomer, Ptolemy, used epicycles to explain the motion of the planets.  Though circles are very simple, the project of describing the huge planet's motions with those simple circles worked surprisingly well.

I've found that it sometimes it takes simple things like circles to remind us of the big things, like the planets.  It's a lofty goal, but I'd like my little teeny-tiny game pieces to remind people of some of the really important stuff in life -- friends, family, and having fun.

Creatively, I am highly inspired by my grandmother, who taught me how to crochet, weave, sew, and bake bread and cookies at a young age.

Spiritually, Jesus is my all-in-all and sustains me both in daily life as well as in my creative endeavors.  

In all the rest of life, my husband is my love forever, my inspiration, my source of strength.  He deploys often as a Navy pilot, and working on things for this shop helps get me through some of the boredom and loneliness that comes with having him gone.  But we always look forward to playing games together again!

results.title: CUSTOM Personalized double-sided felt car mat
results.description:
Made entirely from eco-friendly felt, this double-sided car mat is perfect for the little car enthusiast in your life.  Side (A) features 4 pockets with numbers appliqued on each pocket and the child's first initial as a road. Side (B) features machine-stitched roads and 7 appliqued felt shapes which are perfect for helping your little one practice their shapes and colors while they play. Car mat folds up and securely closes with a magnetic snap for easy portability. 

You get to choose the color of side (A) and which letter you would like as a road. Side (B) will be medium green. If you have preferences on the colors of the shapes and number please specify in the notes to seller section otherwise I will use my best judgement.

All roads, shapes, and numbers are machine stitched. No glue!

*cars not included

Car Mat measures approximately 9.75" X 16"
4 pockets approximately 3.25" X 2.25" each
Roads measure approximately 1.75" wide

Car mats are sewn by me in a smoke/pet free environment.

results.title: Iconica Series One Box Set
results.description:
PRELUDE TO AN EPIC

Shortly after the release of my first book - Prelude, I decided to create a game experience which incorporated some of the characters from the World of Rynaga. I spent about four years working on what would become Iconica.

This boxed set includes the very first characters ever created for Iconica. It features wanderers, romantics, fighters and fools hailing from many different lands across the land of Veratar (see Explorer's Map item in our shop). Many of these archetypes play a role in the books and stories we're creating.

Iconica Series One is made up of 22 individual characters. Not only does this set include all of the cards in this series, it comes with additional game pieces, allowing for 4-player team games right out of the box.

ABOUT ICONICA

Iconica is an indie card game set within the World of Rynaga. Iconica blends strategy with a twist of chance for a card game experience in a category of its own. Intuitive gameplay, colorful characters and lots of backstory. It’s more than a game, it’s a journey.

You'll like Iconica if you:

1. like games in which you're faced with choices (and some chance)
2. want layers of complexity without reading 45 pages of rules 
3. like teaming up with friends during games
4. want a NEW experience in a fictional setting
5. want a game where there are no junk/duplicate/fodder cards
6. like games with a rich backstory
7. like games with RPG flavor

DETAILS

Iconica Character Cards are professionally printed in small print runs. This Iconica Series One Box Set ships in a reusable box and includes the following:

> 22 Iconica Character Cards (character #1-22, depicted in the photos)
> 1 Iconica Quick Reference card
> 2 pairs of dice
> 2 sets of game pieces
> 2-player and 4-player Iconica rules

CHARACTER LIST

#1 – Featherune Sentinel
#2 – Karkalan Dreadnaut
#3 – Silentwood Hunter
#4 – Featherune Bowmaiden
#5 – Shadowhand Agent
#6 – Northern Rim Ranger
#7 – Kril Assassin
#8 – Araylian Pathfinder
#9 – Phaedran Sentinel
#10 – Vanmark Nightwatcher
#11 – Black Door Shrieve
#12 – Symetran Songsayer
#13 – Drakhan Raider
#14 – Thornholde Sentinel
#15 – Greystalk Vaygr Slayer
#16 – Karmethian Chemist
#17 – Blue Hollow Avenir
#18 – Vanessian Paragon
#19 – Lunaen Masquer
#20 – Ithilian Cipher
#21 – Hirojan Brew Master
#22 – Traveling Wildcard

Concept, illustration and design: Eric Torres
Testing and development: Rynaga Development Team
Publisher: Specimen Design
Language: English
ISBN-13: 978-0-9801498-1-4
Reusable Box Dimensions: 5.5 x 7.5 x 1

The World of Rynaga – Iconica
© 2010-2013 Specimen Design

www.rynaga.com

Shop.title: The World of Rynaga | Indie-Made Design Merchandise
Shop.announcement:
I'm a writer, illustrator and designer living in sunny Phoenix, AZ. The creations found here are set within a fictional world called Rynaga (rin-ah-gah). Each artifact is rooted in the lore, color, stories, characters and creatures of Rynaga and is for made for anyone who loves original art and fiction.

This project is truly a family effort. With the support of my wife Larissa and son Gavin, we publish and ship small batches of design merchandise through our privately held creative company, Specimen. Our goal is to create an independent fictional franchise supported by friends, patrons and participants.

Thanks for visiting our shop. Contact us anytime with questions or comments. Safe travels!

-Eric and the World of Rynaga Crew

© Specimen Design
> Website: rynaga.com
> Facebook: facebook.com/worldofrynaga
> Instagram: specimendesign
> Twitter: @erictorres, @specimendesign
Shop.vacation_message:
Hey there. I'm on vacation right now. (Fun, fun!) Orders placed between February 8th and February 17th will ship the week of February 18th. Thanks and safe travels!

-Eric
Shop.sale_message:
Thanks for your order! Please note: products ship within 3-5 business days. Let me know if you have any questions. Rynaga may be a big place, but I check my email!

Also, please leave any feedback you may have for me on my Etsy store. It really helps me look for ways to improve your experience.

Safe travels! 

-Eric
Shop.policy_welcome:
Thanks for your interest in our creations. It's really important to us to create products that are as sustainable as possible while maintaining high production values and paying attention to every detail.

We want to do the right thing for our supporters. If you're happy, we're happy. Review our policies and if we don't answer a question you have, please contact us. The World of Rynaga may be a big place, but we check our email daily!

-Eric Torres and the World of Rynaga Crew
Shop.policy_payment:
At this time, we only accept PayPal transactions. It's secure and you don't have to have a PayPal account to make a payment!

Please note: As part of your payment, we're required to collect sales tax from Arizona residents.
Shop.policy_shipping:
Orders ship via United States Post Service. Unless otherwise noted, orders ship within 3-5 business days. Estimated time of arrival within the U.S. is approximately 2-5 business days. For international orders, please allow up to 10 business days, it's usually quicker though. You'll receive an email notification once shipping has occurred.

Prints are shipped in stay flat mailers or in reinforced tubing, depending on the size of the print. They are shipped within protective sheeting which is great for storage and prevents damage from dust, spills and scratches.

Prints ship within 1-3 weeks of order date. Orders can be expedited for a small fee, just contact me and we'll work it out. Please be sure that your current shipping address is updated before you buy as I will ship to whatever address is on your PayPal account. Print orders ship on Mondays.
Shop.policy_refunds:
To avoid the likelihood of a return, please email us with any questions you may have before purchasing an item.

We take great care to ship our creations as securely as possible to protect against handling damage. However, if you're not satisfied with your purchase, just return it to us within 5 business days for a full refund. Let us know why you are returning your purchase. Items must be returned completely in the condition they were received.

Unfortunately, shipping costs are not refundable.
Shop.policy_additional:
Ordering

We understand pictures don't always tell the whole story on an item, so email us if you have detailed questions. Please read the descriptions for each item on my site. We try to be very clear about things like sizing, materials and finish.

About Our Prints

LIMITED EDITION PRINTS are signed and numbered by hand. These Giclee prints range in paper size from 8x10 to 16x20 and are made in small batches or created when ordered, depending on the size. We do take requests for custom sizes so contact us for a quote.

OPEN EDITION PRINTS may include similar art as limited edition prints, yet are characterized by differences in sizing, color, composition, detail level, vertical and horizontal orientation and paper quality. These prints are still created with the Giclee print-making method and are signed before shipping.

Caring for Giclee Prints

Do not handle prints with dirty or greasy hands. The paper is fragile and easily scratched, soiled and stained. Take care not to bend or crease the print as well. For best display results, position the art so that it receives a good amount of light. Using small picture lights or adjustable track lighting to place light on the image will give the art a whole new level of presence.

Books

Books are signed before they are shipped. If you are ordering the book as a gift, please let us know the name of the recipient so that Eric can personalize the message a bit more.
Shop.vacation_autoreply:
Hello! I'm on vacation right now so expect to hear back from me upon our return the week of February 18th.

As a side note, orders placed between February 8th and February 17th will ship the week of February 18th.

Thanks and safe travels!

-Eric

results.title: Pirate Wars classic battle game
results.description:
Kids never get enough of pirate fun. Housed in a travel sized wooden box, this game is based on the classic Rock-Paper-Sissors but has the goal of collecting your opponents gold. Using pirate items like the Map, a Sword, and a Cannon ball, you do the ultimate battle of wits to undo your opponents choice of weapons. Simple game for two  Pirates 6-adult, the instructions are applied to the back of the box. (back label pictured.) 

If you have never played this classic game to settle disputes as kids now is your chance settle up with Gold..... ME HEARTY.

Shop.title: Family Adventures Without Leaving Home
Shop.announcement:
We are dedicated to family fun. We wish to offer unique games that promote family interaction. We want to share the fun we had, with you.

Our games are original and unlike any you will find elsewhere. They create an atmosphere of healthy family interaction, where all ages can come together and experience an adventure on a level playing field.   

 All games are produced and assembled at our family game facility (our home). Board games are have a Laser printed surface. The cards are printed by a custom card printer and due to low volume these often contribute a large part of the cost of some games. We have a limited stock of some items, just let us know your needs .

In these days of impersonal electronic communication and electronic entertainment we believe family time is a valuable treasure worth digging for.

You can turn the UN-FAMILY into a  FUN-FAMILY !

results.title: NEW Deer Hunting Game captures the essence of an actual hunt.
results.description:
A brand new hunting game! REQUESTED, TESTED & APPROVED by hunters but also a great game for family members that don't hunt! This original game also has a "shut the box" component built into the game play, so people who love shut the box are also sure to enjoy this game. 2-4 player ages 9 - and up game duration is about 45min.

"Deer Season" captures the very essence of the actual deer hunting experience, but from the safety and comfort of home.  This deer season never closes so your hunter, or would- be hunters can spend time in the woods waiting for that trophy buck whenever the urge strikes! 

Even those who have never hunted before will enjoy this game and will have hunting stories of their own to share!  This is simply the best hunting experience you can have with family and friends without leaving home, The deer are constantly moving, they come and go as well as changing their position and range.     
  
The quad fold Game Board (16.5 x 16.5 inches), the box is 11 x11 x 1.5 inches.  Each game comes with a deck of 42 living deer cards, 4 deer licenses & ID lanyards, alternate deer stand discs,16 deer tags, 4 colored Harvest / storage bags, a pair of shooting dice and dozens of multi colored glass gems for hunting operations. An instruction booklet, a deer magnet to razz fellow hunters who miss a shot, and the "Buck of Fame" used to highlight the accomplishment of the exceptional achievement of  bagging the elusive "King Buck" are all part of this extraordinary game!

Players can also earn extra Doe Tags , extra shots, or even add a scope to improve their chances.. 

Don’t spook that big buck, or fall asleep in your stand or you may miss a chance to take a rare shot at the crafty King Buck. Even the Game Warden makes an appearance in this game.  Daylight only lasts so long so you might need to start fresh with a new tree stand location.       

 Our newest game & possibly best game to date  - “Deer Season” board game - All Rights Reserves Ship Shape Games 2013.

Shop.title: Family Adventures Without Leaving Home
Shop.announcement:
We are dedicated to family fun. We wish to offer unique games that promote family interaction. We want to share the fun we had, with you.

Our games are original and unlike any you will find elsewhere. They create an atmosphere of healthy family interaction, where all ages can come together and experience an adventure on a level playing field.   

 All games are produced and assembled at our family game facility (our home). Board games are have a Laser printed surface. The cards are printed by a custom card printer and due to low volume these often contribute a large part of the cost of some games. We have a limited stock of some items, just let us know your needs .

In these days of impersonal electronic communication and electronic entertainment we believe family time is a valuable treasure worth digging for.

You can turn the UN-FAMILY into a  FUN-FAMILY !
Shop.sale_message: Thank you for purchasing one of our family friendly games!
Shop.policy_shipping: We usually ship the same day we receive an order. We use priority mail for U.S. orders which is a 2-3 day delivery from when they receive the package. Packages are picked up at 3:00 pm so orders completed before this will go out that day. Orders after 3:00 will go out the following day. International orders are sent first class.
Shop.policy_additional: For local buyers who want to save the cost of shipping contact us an we will arrange for a  meeting place where you can pay and collect your item. I can also create a reserved order with modified pricing so you can pay online and we can deliver it or meet you for delivery.

results.title: Wee Teddy Bear Animal Plush Toy
results.description:
Welcome to the magical world of Cheeky Beasts! Fun loving characters from far far away places… well, from Seattle Washington actually. So, not so far far away for some, but far far away for others.

About Teddy Bear_ 
This little bear is very intelligent, but a tad lazy. Ambition, yeah, not so much. A cute palm sized morsel perfect for hanging from a doorknob, backpack, car rearview mirror, and more. Where will you hang your Cheeky Beasts Teddy Bear from?!

Probably the cutest teddy bear that there ever was, in my opinion. (Though my opinion could be considered bias because I’m the artist)

Body size_ About 4” from foot to tail. About 3.5” from foot to ear. Elastic cord is 4.5” long.

Handmade_ New polyester fleece. New polyfill fiber batting. New plastic safety eyes. This item is handmade by sewing machine in a smoke free pet free environment.

results.title: Counting Alien Softie, Soft Eductational Toy, Preschool Learning Toy Monster
results.description:
HI, I am a friendly alien and have come to planet earth to help you count.

I will help you count from 1 - 10 and I come with a special ID Alien tag with my name and the items on my body for you to find and count.
See if you can find and count my 6 fingers or 8 teeth or turn me over to count my scales and tail.

I measure 25 cm tall and my alien body is 12 cm wide.

I am made from cotton material and wool blend felt. 
I am double stitched and soft and cuddly.

Ages 3+
Listing is for one  alien.

.
