results.title: New Item MINI MONSTER BARF Keychain  Plushie with Barf Bag monster hairball barf Hot pink Lime green and white
results.description:
This is a brand New kind of Monster Barf, Monster Barf KEYCHAINS!!  They are MINI Monster Barfs on Keychains for those of you that would like a Monster Barf but would prefer a smaller size to carry around..
MINI Monster Barf Keychains are great for gag gifts, or a childs birthday party as a prize for all the little monsters at the party..They would also be perfect to carry around on purses or backpacks, or as wedding guest gifts..The list goes on and on for what they could be used for..Everyone needs a little monster in his or her life...

I have so many monsters living here, that i'm constantly cleaning up monster hairballs, they barf them up all over the place, worse than a cat hacking up a hairball..One day I discovered these barf hairballs had eyes and teeth, and they were actually living things..As you can imagine they keep popping up everywhere and I just can't keep them all fed..So I have decided to adopt them out..These things come in all kinds of colors, and some of them actually have what looks like mohawks..If you see a color you like and not the color eyes you want, please convo me, I would be happy to try and find the color of fur and eyes you would like..

These MINI monster barfs are about 3" round and they come in their very own Lime green Monster barf bag..:o)

Each monster is an One of a Kind as they are all handmade by me and I can't never get 2 exactly alike..The monster you order may vary just ever so slightly from the one pictured..

MINI Monster BARFS are made with very high quality silky faux fur,they are stuffed with poly-pellets to give them weight and to make them soft and squishy..
 
MINI Monster BARFS come with their very own adoption certificate with their birthdates, their name will be left blank for you to name yourself, OR if you would like to name it before it is delivered, please convo me with the name and I will put that on the certificate..

Please don't hesitate emailing me with any questions you may have..Thank you,
xoxo Bonnie

Shop.title: For the LOVE of a MONSTER!!
Shop.announcement:
Here you can adopt your own Wicked Little Monster! Well maybe they aren't so Wicked, but they will definately steal your Heart!! 
If you wanna keep updated on more Little Monsters join my fanpage here on Facebook:
http://www.facebook.com/MonsterBarf
We have give aways and discounts just for the fans of MonsterBarf
Or Join my blog to keep you updated on  new things being listed here
http://wickedmoonart.blogspot.com
Shop.sale_message: Thank you for your purchase, your item will be shipped As Soon As Possible..Keep checking back as I will be adding items often...Thank you, Bonnie
Shop.policy_payment:
I accept Paypal, U.S. Money orders, and personal checks, If using a personal check please expect up to a  10 day wait before shipping, as my bank can sometimes take up to 10 business days to clear it..Thank you..
If you would like to cancel an order, please contact me before I ship the item, I have no problem cancelling an order, I know some people change their minds, or may not have the money on hand to buy at that moment..
Shop.policy_refunds: I normally don't accept returns, but if something is damaged, please contact me, I will do everything I can to make the transaction right, either replacing the item or refunding your money..I'm an easy person to work with, I feel like the customer is always right, so be sure that if you have any problems at all you can contact me...
Shop.policy_additional:
I always welcome custom order requests, If I don't think I'm the right person for the job you need I will let you know promplty..
Please don't hesitate to contact me, I'm a people person, I luv meeting new people, and making new friends..

results.title: American Girl 18 inch doll  clothes -  sleepwear - two piece pajamas
results.description:
She is sure to love these cozy two piece  pjs. The red top is made of cotton knit fabric.  It has long sleeves and a ribbon bow at the neckline. The top opens fully at the back, and has hook and loop closure. The bottoms are made from comfy cotton flannel, and have a floral design on yellow background. They have encased elastic at the waist.

Seams are serged for durability. This sleepwear fits 18 inch dolls such as American Girl.  

Doll and accessories are not included.

Shop.title: Quality, affordable handmade clothes for 18 inch dolls
Shop.announcement: I specialize in sewing quality, affordable fashions for some of North America's favorite 18 inch dolls.  My doll clothing is mostly one-of-a-kind, and is designed to fit dolls such as American Girl and Maplelea.
Shop.vacation_message: Whoa It's Me is currently on vacation, reopening Monday, April 22. Please watch for new spring items to be listed later this month.
Shop.sale_message:
Thank you for your purchase!  Shipping will be from one to three days from the date I receive payment. If you require your items urgently, please let me know, and I will do my best to get it in the mail to you as soon as possible.

Thank you!
Trudy
Shop.policy_welcome: WhoaItsMe features quality clothing and accessories for 18 inch dolls such as American Girl and Maplelea. They're handmade for fun!
Shop.policy_payment: I accept PayPal as a form of payment. It has proven to be the safest and the quickest way to enjoy shopping online.
Shop.policy_shipping:
Shipping is within one to three business days of receipt of payment. If your order is urgent, please let me know when you place your order, and I will do my best to get it in the mail to you a quickly as possible.

Shipping is by USPS first class, and includes delivery confirmation. Once your order is placed, I will notify you of the anticipated delivery date and tracking number. Please note delivery confirmation is not available for addresses outside of the US.

If your shipment is to a Canadian address, I am alternately able to ship via Canada Post, which will be faster than shipping from the US, but at a substantially higher cost due to Canada Post rates.  If you prefer to have your purchase shipped from Canada, please let me know and I will provide you with a shipping quote.

I am happy to ship internationally. Please contact me for a shipping quote. Where applicable, international buyers are responsible for any and all duties and customs charges that may be incurred.

Shipping class upgrades and insurance may be additionally purchased upon request before final payment has been made. I cannot be responsible for lost or damaged items if you choose not to purchase insurance.

If I have significantly overestimated shipping and packaging cost, I will happily provide you with a refund.
Shop.policy_refunds:
My aim is to ensure you receive your items quickly and in perfect condition. I want you to love your purchase as much as I enjoyed creating it.  

Because there is a slight variation in  the size of 18 inch dolls, I will accept the return of any item that does not fit the intended doll. Items must be returned within 14 days of the confirmed delivery date, and must not show any wear or use. A refund will be given for the purchase price of the item only.  Shipping will not be reimbursed. The cost to return the item to me is the buyer's responsibility. If you are shipping something back, please let me know that it is on its way.
Shop.policy_additional: On my other Etsy shop, FindingThings - www.etsy.com/shops/FindingThings - you will find some terrific hand knit items, plus interesting vintage items, destash sewing supplies and other unique finds.
Shop.policy_seller_info: My items are made in a smoke-free, pet-free environment.  On occasion, I will acquire fabric from a thrift store if I find something very special.  Also, I will occasionally repurpose an item (such as denim). I almost always launder my fabric prior to sewing with it, with the exception of some fabrics such as flannel, where laundering might change the look or integrity of the fabric.
Shop.vacation_autoreply: Thank you for your interest!  Whoa It's Me is currently closed until Monday, April 22. I will be responding to emails during this time, so you should be hearing from me soon.

results.title: teething toy by EWE Q-TEE
results.description:
fun little teether/ toy

 There are five coordinating 100% cotton fabrics, circled together, around an all-natural wooden ring,creating a loop of grabbing fun. This handheld toy provides a chance to further develop hand-eye coordination and relieve little gums during that painful teething time. No matter where your little one grabs, they will  surely find something to hold onto. A great little teether for home, in the stroller, car, or on the go.

measurements for this teether/toy is approximately 7 1//2 inches across.
these creations were made with your little one in mind, and is great for eye-hand coordination.
made in my EWE Q-TEE smoke free studio.




stick one in your purse, diaper bag,stoller, home, car .... you get the message... baby will love it.

Shop.announcement:
my name is darleen.

i have been sewing baby & toddler items for quite sometime. i have beautiful grandchildren that have helped in the inspiration for my items. i love etsy with all the talent and thought that it was time that i give it a try.  i really hope that you will love my creations, and will not just see the unique textures but also the unique style.  

there will be new items available, shortly.....so please keep checking :)

in each creation, my love and passion is as important to me, as if it was for my own grandchild.....

thanks for visiting.....

darleen
Shop.sale_message: ewe q-tee ....  where everychild is a cutie!!  there will be lots more to come.... so please keep shopping back

results.title: Purchase this listing to design your custom pony from my standard fabrics, we work together to make your ideal HORSE
results.description:
Purchase this listing to design your custom pony from my standard fabrics, we work together to make your ideal HORSE.  With purchase of this listing, you will communicate to me your preferred fabrics (tell me what you are seeking and I'll help) from my standard fabric selection (vast) for the horse head.  You may also select a solid fabric color for the eyes and ears of the horse.  I will select thread accent colors to complement fabrics.  If you choose additional features (a horn for unicorn, a fabric heart or star on the flank, an eye patch) additional charges will apply.  

Please feel free to convo me if you have further questions.  Most people who purchase this listing will already be facebook fans of mine and so will have a good idea of what this encompasses.  Thank you.  This listing is for custom horse to be completed and shipped by end of October 2013.  If your time frame is more demanding than this, please convo me first to see if I can meet your needs.  Also, this does not include any MLP inspired custom horses.  Please convo me if you are wanting anything other than a standard horse.  If you desire a seahorse, cow, goat, sheep, dog, super pony, dragon, etc, please convo me :)

results.description:
Wooden Rattle - Montessori Inspired Baby Toy - Natural Wood Teething Ring - Organic Baby Toy

Fun for babies to look at and hold in their hands, our wooden rattles stimulate the sense of sight, touch, and hearing. Perfectly sized for babies to grasp, they create a pleasant rattling sound when shaken as wooden pieces touch making a soft clunking noise. This baby rattle is made out of maple wood and finished with a homemade mix of beeswax and certified organic food-grade oil. 

This rattle features a string of 14 wooden beads tethered on a strong elastic band and two small solid wooden rings. It measures 3.5" by 3" (approximately 9 cm by 7.5 cm).

results.title: PDF Pattern for 1865 Cape Island Dress, by Kindred Thread - for 18-inch American Girl, 18-inch Gotz, and 16-inch A Girl For All Time Dolls
results.description:
Sew your own version of this iconic 1860s girls dress from the collection of the Wisconsin Historical Museum. Pattern features short sleeves set-in raglan style and a wide shallow scooped neck with a narrow yoke emphasizing the neckline. Calf-length skirt is pleated or gathered to a wide self-fabric waistband. View A has pleated bodice and skirt, puffed sleeves with fitted cuffs, and soutache braid trim. View B has gathered bodice and skirt with pintuck detailing.

Multi-sized pattern in Small, Medium, and Large is designed to fit 18-inch American Girl dolls, 18-inch Gotz and Kidz ‘n’ Cats dolls, and 16-inch A Girl For All Time dolls.

A 24 page pattern in PDF format will be available for instant download after purchase. It is designed to print on standard 8-1/2″ by 11″ paper. The pattern itself is not too difficult, but some sewing experience will be helpful. Extra instructions are included for marking trim placement and applying soutache trim.

This listing is for a PDF version of the pattern. A printed version is available upon request, but will include a $3.45 printing and shipping charge.

For customers who have already purchased this pattern that would like to request an updated version, please send me a convo with your receipt number and the e-mail address you would like it sent to.

Clothing made from this pattern may be sold solely by the original purchaser.
Design and Pattern Copyright 2013 by Kindred Thread. All Rights Reserved.
Illustrations Copyright 2013 by Shari Fuller. All Rights Reserved.

Last Revised: 9/11/13

results.title: Design Your Own Dragon Amigurumi Crochet Plush Toy
results.description:
Design your own Dragon Amigurumi - You pick the colors, and I make it for you! 
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
THIS IS NOT A PATTERN - I do not sell my Tiny Dragon pattern at this time.
NOT INTENDED FOR CHILDREN OR ANIMALS - Potential choking hazard
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Turnaround time: 1 to 2 weeks to make - shipping times vary by location

Measurements: about 3.5 inches (9 cm) tall

Please read ALL of the following information before making your purchase! If you do not send me your color choice information I will not be able to make anything! If you do not respond within 48 hrs of purchase to any follow up convos or emails your order will be canceled. Again, I can't make it if I don't know what colors you want!

STEP 1:
Decide for sure what colors you want your dragon to be. Pick eye color, horns, wings, body. Choose up to 4 yarn colors if you want the horns different from the wing colors.

Eye colors: 
Yellow, Green, Orange, Blue, Red, Gold, Silver
(pick only one color for both eyes) (these are the only colors available at this time)

Yarn colors (please refer to the yarn color chart above): 
Brown, Dark Brown, Gray, Dark Gray, Black, White, Cream, Cornmeal, Yellow, Goldenrod, Orange, Rust, Red, Dark Red, Mint, Green, Light Green, Kelly Green, Dark Green, Dark Turquoise, Turquoise, Light Aqua, Light Blue, Blue, Dark Blue, Dark Purple, Purple, Pink, Light Pink
-----------
STEP 2:

Please highlight and copy the following form:

Body:
Eyes:
Wings:
Horns:

You will paste this in the next step and add your color choices...
-----------
STEP 3:

Click the green "Add to Cart" button to add this item to your cart, and DO NOT proceed to checkout just yet! 

Paste the form you copied in step 2 into the "Note to GeekyCuteCrochet" box below the item picture, and FILL OUT YOUR COLOR CHOICES.

If you want to purchase more than one dragon follow these steps: 
Click on the green "Add to Cart" button, on the next page you can select the quantity in the drop-down box next to the item's picture, add your color choices for each dragon in the "Note to GeekyCuteCrochet" box below the item, then click the "Proceed to Checkout" button on the right.
-----------
STEP 4:

Did you remember to fill out your color choices in the notes box? Good! 

You may now click the green "Proceed to Checkout" button to complete your purchase. Above that button you can select either to pay with PayPal or with a credit card through Etsy.
----------
STEP 5:

Patiently wait for me to complete your dragon. It will take 1 to 2 weeks for me to make. You will receive an email from Etsy when your item has shipped.

This service is also available for select international destinations, but not available to all countries at this time. International orders are handed off from USPS to the country's national mail carrier once it arrives in the country of its destination. You are responsible to pay for any customs/duties/taxes/fees that your country charges for imports.

You must pay for your item within 5 days of purchase or else the transaction will be canceled. E-Check payments will not be shipped out until the payment clears.

Shop.policy_shipping:
Your paid purchase will be shipped as quickly as possible via USPS First-Class in a moisture-resistant bubble mailer. Made to order items will be shipped on or before the specified "ship by" date.

If you need quicker shipping please message me before making your purchase so I can give you a shipping quote.

US ORDERS:
Your package will be shipped via USPS First Class. When your item has shipped you will be given a Delivery Confirmation number that can be used to track your package. It usually takes 2 to 5 days for packages to be delivered.

INTERNATIONAL ORDERS:
Your package will be shipped via USPS First Class International. Once the package arrives in your country it will be handed off to your country's postal carrier for customs processing and final delivery. You will be given a customs form number, but tracking is not available for most countries. The customs form will be marked as "merchandise". Each item and the total amount paid for the items will also be included on the form. I have absolutely no control over the time it will take to be delivered, that is dependent on your country's postal carrier. Shipping usually takes 1 week, but can take up to 6 weeks depending on your country's customs/border inspection and the speed of your postal service. You are responsible to pay for any customs/duties/taxes/fees that your country charges for imports. I legally am not allowed to cover these expenses since I am considered the exporter and the recipient is the importer.

INTERNATIONAL DELIVERY CONFIRMATION is available for these countries:
Canada, Australia, Belgium, Brazil, Croatia, Denmark, France, Germany, Great Britain and Northern Ireland, Israel, Netherlands, New Zealand, Spain and Switzerland.

results.description:
ISABELLA -- photography by Bella Gemma Photography

Meet "Isabella"... she is a 4-sided medium-sized teepee is constructed of muslin fabric. She comes with one set of ivory grograin ribbon door tie backs for versatility and two rows of 3" ivory lace trim on the door opening and two additional rows of lace at the top of each side. Each side has 12" of fabric extending past the poles.

42" on each of the 4 sides
poles are 66"

FLOWER GARLAND IS NOT INCLUDED IN PRICE

PLEASE ALLOW 14 BUSINESS DAYS FOR PRODUCTION AND DELIVERY
SHIPS WITH POLES
ARRIVES COMPLETELY ASSEMBLED
BUILT TO LAST
FOR USE INDOORS OR OUTDOORS
COLLAPSES LIKE AN UMBRELLA

We are proud to offer handcrafted teepees that require little to no setup.  

Most photographers use photo props to add interest to their photos. Props can be used in countless ways to add impact to the composition and add extra dimension to the photo.

The majority of our teepees are constructed of a muslin fabric.  In general, muslin does not show wrinkles.  Muslin is a versatile fabric for backgrounds because it can be used as a very neutral background or made to stand out, depending on the lighting.  It is lightweight and diffuses the light beautifully.  The poles are made out of sturdy pvc pipe, wrapped with matching vinyl tape. The ends of each pole are completely enclosed so they are scratch free. 

We specialize in photo prop teepees but all of our 4-sided teepees are ideal for play. With no batteries, no moving parts and no loud noises, these teepees are a great place for children to pretend play, read a book or just have a little time to themselves.

CUSTOM ORDERS: Convo me if you would like a custom order. Custom orders need to be paid in full prior to ordering any material.

SHIPPING: I ship USPS priority mail and your teepee should arrive in 2-3 days 
Canada usually takes 2-3 weeks to arrive

I value your feedback and would love to hear what you have to say about your experience with my products and shop.

results.title: Montessori Inspired Wooden Baby Rattle
results.description:
This Montessori inspired wooden rattle is pleasing to both the eyes and ears. When shaken, the wood makes a lovely sound! It is approximately 4 inches in length, making it easy for your baby to grasp. The rattle is finished with a natural homemade blend of beeswax and olive oil. The ends are attached with non-toxic wood glue. 

The rattle is available in a variety of colors including natural, pink, green, yellow, orange, and purple. The colors are created through homemade dyes, using all natural ingredients: blueberries, red cabbage, beets, onions, and turmeric. The colors are more subtle than commercial dyes, so please see the example picture with beads dyed in each of these colors.

If you would like the tri-colored ring rattle as pictured in the 4th photo, please add a comment when you're checking out about which color you'd like the rings to be.

Shop.title: Essential Montessori Handcrafted Toys
Shop.announcement:
We offer handcrafted Montessori-inspired infant toys. All items are sealed with a custom beeswax / olive oil blend, and we have also developed natural homemade dyes that can be used to add subtle color to any toy. Although our product line is still small, we are continuing to develop new products and are open to customizations and suggestions if you contact us. Thank you for your support!

"The use of wood instead of plastic helps the child appreciate the natural world, the colors, shades and grains of wood, and the varying weight of wooden toys in a variety of sizes and densities. Quality shows a respect for the child and teaches the child respect for belongings. Beauty and durability are important at all ages for the child's tastes are being formed at this time of life. People who learn to appreciate living with beauty early in life can more easily lead us in creating a beautiful home, and perhaps, a beautiful world, when they grow up." - The Joyful Child
Shop.sale_message: Thank you so much for your order! I will get started handcrafting this item for you and send a follow-up message with tracking information as soon as it has shipped. In the meantime, if there's anything at all I can do for you, please don't hesitate to contact me. Thanks!
Shop.policy_shipping: We ship via USPS First Class mail with tracking.
Shop.policy_additional: I do offer a small discount for whole sale orders of over 10 or 25 of a particular item. Please contact me for further details.

results.title: Finger Puppets Pack of 25 Lot Assorted Hand Knit Adorable Unique Animals Birds Insects Farm
results.description:
Product Description
Hand knit in Lima Peru by the women of Lumbreras, a dusty hillside in one of Latin America's largest cities. Our knitters are single women raising children on their own. In our workshop they produce these wonderful finger puppets and can feed their children and watch over them. They are paid Fair Trade standard wages and are able to support their families. Most importantly, they have learned a trade that will allow the to make a living and they have pride for the work they do.
Product Features
Fairly traded hand knit finger puppets 3.5" Peru
Assorted animals, insects,birds and people to use in one hand
Washable made of Acrylic and Cotton fibers
Wonderful for Story Telling and Child Play with 5 piece assortment
Great Item for Scholastic and Fund Raising Purposes

Shop.title: Preserving Culture through Fair Trade
Shop.announcement: Fair trade – incazteca was created to be much more than just a great value import gift store. Our mission is to offer uniquely beautiful merchandise,  high-quality styles and variety without the exploitation of workers and the environment that too often goes with the territory. We believe paying people fairly and treating each person with respect and dignity should be a prerequisite for doing business, period. We aim to advocate for amazingly talented artisans who aren't in the position to advocate on their own behalf. The items in our shop are beautiful and all handcrafted by small producer groups or individual artisans who are paid a living wage for their labor under safe working conditions. This living wage allows them to meet basic needs such as clean water, education, medical care, etc. Fair trade also helps defeat the problems of human trafficking, forced child labor, slavery and illegal immigration. We believe that if we change the way we make our purchases, we can help make the world a better place!
Shop.sale_message:
The vision for incazteca is to build a solid and long term partnership with artisans in Mexico, Guatemala and Peru, meanwhile contributing to the development of the local community and bringing life to the South Broadway business district in the city of Denver.
incazteca Fair Trade Store, 1855 South Broadway, Denver, CO, 80210 specializes in unique, high-quality, handcrafted and fairly-traded products from Aztec and Inca origin (Mexico, Guatemala and Peru). We are about making a positive economic connection between American consumers and marginalized artisans from these developing nations.

results.title: Plush Halloween Fairy Elf Sprite
results.description:
This is Atiana, a little swirling Fairy Sprite ready to celebrate Halloween with you. She makes a great little door hanger or a cute addition to your centerpiece! Just let me know if you want a ribbon added for hanging.

She is all hand sewn. Her body is made from felt and I have added cotton fabrics to make up her dress. She sports a large black bow and a ruffle of vintage lace below the bow. Her dress is polka dotted and she has a hat of felt flowers covering her angelina silk wool hair! Her hair is a sweet light violet and brown color mix and it sparkles!

Her face is hand embroidered and her cheeks are made with pink felt and have sequins and glass beads sewn on!
She is 3 1/2" tall and 5" wide.

Please convo me if you would like a ribbon or a bell added.
Thank you for visiting www.mommylion.etsy.com

results.title: Xander Fox Mask and Tail Pretend Play Costume Woodland
results.description:
Xander Fox Mask and Tail

Introducing Xander the sly fox. He likes to cause harmless trouble, play at inappropriate times (like when he should be napping)  and is the best at slinking around behind your back. His intentions are good, but sometimes something comes over this fellow and he has to sneak that extra cookie from the top shelf.

Xander comes with a mask and tail. This felt mask is adjustable with an elastic allowing It to expand and grow with your sly fox. The felt is soft on the skin. The tail is ment to hang off a belt with an attached loop.  Swing your tail with pride, stur up a storm as you play. Watch out everyone!  Xander is on a roll...there he goes down the hall!

This mask  and tail will provide hours of fun and entertainment while encouraging you little one to use his imagination at the same time. 

Tail is 15 inches long.

Fox fun: Have a scavenger hunt with items that start with the letters F-O-X.  Items can include things like a flag, orange items, and of course Xander the fox! Incorporate the whole family for hours of fun.

Make sure you stop over to my facebook page, hit like to get a heads up on new listings and fun giveaways. http://www.facebook.com/HuntingFaeries 

Faerie blessings

Shop.title: Hunting Faeries
Shop.announcement:
HUNTING FAERIES
Inspiring make believe and creative play for wee folk

My most frequently asked question...
Q. Will this fit an adult? 
A. Masks are one size fits all! Yes they fit adults...still unsure send a convo! I'll show you!

I can no longer take any custom orders unless it already exists in my shop. If I'm out of something chances are that I am sewing it up as you convo me. Don't hesitate to convo to reserve a piece! Some items are ready made but my popular items are usually in rotation, if its sold out I'm stitching away to make them for "made to orders". My turnaround is about 7-10 days, plenty of time to get it before Halloween!

I'm having a photo contest on my facebook page! Send in your best photo of you  or your little ones in a Hunting Faeries costume to enter to win $50 in store credit! 

Head over to my facebook page.
Add yourself to my facebook page for info on other giveaways and specials! www.facebook.com/huntingfaeries
Shop.sale_message:
Thank you for your purchase and for supporting independent artists. If your itme is ready made it  will be shipped within 48 hours of payment, toherwise check out your invoice for ship time. 

Most of the time items ship before the date stated. I ship USPS first class but am happy to accomodate a faster ship upon request, but please remember it will increase the price and needs to be paid by the buyer. 

All international packages go out first class package rate. For internatinoal buyers flat rate priority is approx. $24.00 to upgrade from first class.

 Please convo with any questions. I'm happy to work with you on a different shipping rate to accomodate your needs. Thank you!
Shop.policy_welcome:
I am a stay at home mother to two beautiful and rather rambunctious children. Most of my best ideas come from them, and from the need to keep them occupied. The concept of this shop is based on pretend play. Something that we lose site of in lieu of the television. I've found that both my children love to dress up and become something else. I've encouraged it by creating our own costumes. They can become someone else, in a different time, in a different place. 

Friends and family have loved receiving our kids birthday gifts for years. A felt cape with matching mask and cuffs for the boys and crowns and wands for the girls. They were a huge success! It was easy to see that there was a demand for such items. And beautifuly hand crafted to boot. Over the last few years I've expanded my horizon.

 I love hand embroidery and like to do this when it is applicable. There is something about working with my own two hands that is so satisfying to me. I often envision a project even before the one in my hands is completed. 

Needless to say I am always listening and watching my children for more inspiration.  Stay tuned for it in my work....

I ship vis USPS. Prices reflect first class shipping.  If you are in a rush and  would like prority I am happy to comply. Insurance is optional but encouraged. 

International buyers please wait for adjusted ship rate as they differ greatly from our domsestic rates.
Shop.policy_refunds: I am happy to take returns on items in the condition they were sent. I do the best to describe my items fully, if you have questions please convo me before you purchase!

results.title: Custom Sock dog and Sock horse
results.description:
I do custom sock dog and sock horse.  For custom sock dog basic cost is $55.00 if the dog has long hair or two tone cost is $65.00.  If both long hair and two tone cost is $75.00. Sock dog comes with a free dog tag with 2 lines max 13 characters.  Please type what you want engraved on the tag.

Sock horse basic starts at $55.  With hair on hooves or two tone cost is $65.  If both two tone and with hairs on hooves cost is $75.  For a limited time sock horse comes with a free horse blanket with embroidery.  Go to my website www.soxydolls.com under custom sock horse for choices on fabric and fonts.  Free blanket expires Oct. 31, 2013.
